channel.title: The Grimaldi International Colorado Real Estate Video Feed
channel.description:
Real estate video tours of homes for sale in the Beaver Creek, Bachelor Gulch, Arrowhead, and Vail Colorado regions, presented by Mark Grimaldi of Grimaldi International Real Estate.

For more information, please contact Mark Grimaldi by email at grimaldi@vail.net or visit Grimaldi International online at www.grimaldirealestate.com today.

This real estate video tour feed is presented by www.AgentCasts.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: The Grimaldi International Colorado Real Estate Video Feed
channel.itunes:summary:
Real estate video tours of homes for sale in the Beaver Creek, Bachelor Gulch, Arrowhead, and Vail Colorado regions, presented by Mark Grimaldi of Grimaldi International Real Estate.
Luxury Real Estate Sales for Colorado's Finest Mountain Resort Properties-Serving the Vail Valley, Beaver Creek, Bachelor Gulch, Arrowhead, and Eagle Valley. Confidential, First Class Service-References upon request.
For more information, please contact Mark Grimaldi by email at grimaldi@vail.net or visit Grimaldi International online at www.grimaldirealestate.com today.
